Package client

Class ClientAITUI

java.lang.Object
client.ClientAITUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientTUI
public class ClientAITUI extends Object implements ClientTUI
This class represents the client's TUI for the AI. The user can choose a strategy and the client will play the game using that strategy. The AI needs to be manually queued, by typing "queue" in the console. Allows for dynamic changing of the difficulty level, by typing "1", "2" or "3" in the console.

      public void runCommandThread(Scanner input)

      Parameters:
      input - , a scanner object reading the user's input.
